Test Name: Pathology Consultation (Histopathology, Cytology, Molecular Pathology, Microbiology)
Specimen Type: Clinical specimens such as tissue biopsies, body fluids, fine needle aspirates, and microbiological samples
Purpose: To examine and analyze clinical specimens using histological, cytological, molecular, and microbiological methods in order to generate accurate pathology consultation reports.
Container: Formalin-fixed tissue containers, glass slides, sterile screw-cap containers or tubes appropriate to specimen type
Equipment: Tissue processor, microtome, light microscope, PCR thermocycler/sequencer, microbiology culture incubator
